question: Which article was referred to as the 'the heart and soul' of the constitution by Dr. B.R, Ambedkar?
explanation: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar called 'Article 32' of the Indian Constitution i.e. Right to Constitutional remedies as 'the heart and soul of the Constitution'. It was acknowledged because mere declaration of the fundamental right without an effective machinery for enforcement of the fundamental rights would have been meaningless.
